long_description: The dual-speaker UCLEAR HBC 120+ Snow Helmet Communicator syncs with your Bluetooth(R)-enabled phone and reduces ambient noise for crystal-clear conversations and music while you hit the slopes. Listen and wirelessly control your music, make calls using voice commands and communicate with other HBC users. Easy-to-use controls and voice activation allow you to answer/decline calls, toggle through songs and accept 3-way calls without taking off your gloves. Two high-fidelity speakers with built-in microphones help ensure clarity even under noisy conditions. Also works as an intercom with other HBC120 units within 10m. Tough weatherproof casings resist snow and dust. Rechargeable lithium-ion batteries offer 10 hrs. of talk time, charge in 2 hrs. and function in temperatures raging from - 4degF - 140degF (-20&3176;C - 60deg). Dual UCLEAR HBC120+ Snow Helmet Communicator comes with a USB charging cable, goggles strap accessory, helmet strap accessory, 18 in. extention cord and mic alignment stencils.
